original: @76a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @76a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta sto tram /
analyzed: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta sto tram /
translated: Prajnaparamita Stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Perfection of Wisdom

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lady, the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: gang khyod sku kun nyes med la //
analyzed: gang khyod sku kun nyes med la //
translated: You whose body is free from all faults,

original: nyes med rnams kyis gzigs mdzad pa //
analyzed: nyes med rnams kyis gzigs mdzad pa //
translated: and who beholds with faultless eyes,

original: dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: limitless perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par mi rtog phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I bow down to you, free from conceptualization.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du gos med cing //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du gos med cing //
translated: Like space, you are unstained,

original: spros pa med cing yi ge med //
analyzed: spros pa med cing yi ge med //
translated: free from conceptual elaboration, and without syllables.

original: bsam yas khyod mthong gang yin pa //
analyzed: bsam yas khyod mthong gang yin pa //
translated: Those who behold you, inconceivable,

original: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //
analyzed: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //
translated: see the Thus-Gone One.üîΩNoble one, rich in qualities,

original: 'phags ma yon tan phyug khyod dang // sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams //
analyzed: 'phags ma yon tan phyug khyod dang // sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams //
translated: and the Buddhas, the teachers of the world,

original: khyad par yod par ma 'khums to //
analyzed: khyad par yod par ma 'khums to //
translated: I do not see any difference between you.

original: zla ba dang ni zla 'od bzhin //
analyzed: zla ba dang ni zla 'od bzhin //
translated: You are like the moon and moonlight.

original: gus la byams ma sangs rgyas kyi //
analyzed: gus la byams ma sangs rgyas kyi //
translated: With devotion, I love you, the mother of the Buddhas,

original: chos kyi sngon 'gro khyod brtan nas //
analyzed: chos kyi sngon 'gro khyod brtan nas //
translated: the forerunner of the Dharma.

original: thugs rje'i bdag nyid mnyam med pa'i //
analyzed: thugs rje'i bdag nyid mnyam med pa'i //
translated: You are the embodiment of compassion,

original: bdag nyid chen por bde blag 'gro //üîΩlan cig tsam yang bsam dag pas //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen por bde blag 'gro // lan cig tsam yang bsam dag pas //
translated: and you easily go to the great state.üîΩEven if you are seen only once,üîΩwith a pure mind,

original: khyod la tshul bzhin blta ba dang // des kyang mthong ba don yod kyi //
analyzed: khyod la tshul bzhin blta ba dang // des kyang mthong ba don yod kyi //
translated: that seeing is meaningful,

original: dngos grub des par thob par 'gyur //üîΩgzhan don mngon dga'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: dngos grub des par thob par 'gyur // gzhan don mngon dga'i bdag nyid can //
translated: and you will certainly obtain spiritual powers.üîΩYou are the mother of all the heroes

original: dpa' bo dag ni thams cad kyi //üîΩgso mdzad bskyed par mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: dpa' bo dag ni thams cad kyi // gso mdzad bskyed par mdzad pa ste //
translated: who delight in benefiting others.

original: khyod ni byams ma'i yum lags so //
analyzed: khyod ni byams ma'i yum lags so //
translated: You are the nurse and the nurturer

original: gang slad sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso //
analyzed: gang slad sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso //
translated: of the buddhas, the lords of the world.üîΩYou are the mother of the compassionate

original: thugs rje can rnams khyod kyi sras //
analyzed: thugs rje can rnams khyod kyi sras //
translated: ones, the sons of the buddhas.

original: de yi slad du dge ma khyod //
analyzed: de yi slad du dge ma khyod //
translated: Therefore, you, the virtuous one,

original: sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags //üîΩpha rol phyin pa dri med pa //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags // pha rol phyin pa dri med pa //
translated: are the grandmother of all sentient beings.üîΩYou are the stainless perfections,

original: kun gyis ma smad pa khyod kyi //
analyzed: kun gyis ma smad pa khyod kyi //
translated: unblamed by anyone.

original: dus kun rjes su 'brang lags pa //
analyzed: dus kun rjes su 'brang lags pa //
translated: You follow at all times,

original: rgyu skar rnams kyis zla ris bzhin //
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams kyis zla ris bzhin //
translated: like the moon by the stars.

original: gdul bya'i 'gro ba la brten nas //
analyzed: gdul bya'i 'gro ba la brten nas //
translated: In dependence on the beings to be tamed,

original: de dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
analyzed: de dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
translated: the tathƒÅgatas

original: khyod nyid gcig pu tshul mang du //
analyzed: khyod nyid gcig pu tshul mang du //
translated: You alone are praised in many ways

original: sna tshogs mtshan gyis bsngags pa mdzad //
analyzed: sna tshogs mtshan gyis bsngags pa mdzad //
translated: By the various marks.

original: zil pa'i chu yi thigs pa rnams //
analyzed: zil pa'i chu yi thigs pa rnams //
translated: Like drops of dew

original: nyi ma'i 'od dang mjal ba bzhin //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od dang mjal ba bzhin //
translated: Meeting with the sun‚Äôs rays,

original: rgol ba rnams kyi rtsod dang skyon //
analyzed: rgol ba rnams kyi rtsod dang skyon //
translated: The disputes and faults of the opponents

original: khyod dang mjal na 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod dang mjal na 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: Will be destroyed upon meeting you.

original: khyod nyid byis pa rnams la ni //
analyzed: khyod nyid byis pa rnams la ni //
translated: You are seen by the childishüîΩAs frightening, but

original: skrag byed mthong na 'jigs pa dang // @76b mkhas pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa //
analyzed: skrag byed mthong na 'jigs pa dang // @76b mkhas pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa //
translated: You are seen by the wise

original: skyed pas mthong na zhi ba lags //üîΩkhyod mgon gang la khyod la yang //
analyzed: skyed pas mthong na zhi ba lags // khyod mgon gang la khyod la yang //
translated: As peaceful, since they are relieved.üîΩIf you, O protector, are not

original: mngon par chags pa mnga' min na //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa mnga' min na //
translated: Attached to yourself,

original: de la yum gcig ji ltar na //
analyzed: de la yum gcig ji ltar na //
translated: Then, O mother, how can

original: gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung //üîΩkhyod ni gang nas ma byon zhing //
analyzed: gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung // khyod ni gang nas ma byon zhing //
translated: Attachment and aversion arise toward others?üîΩYou have not come from anywhere

original: gang du yang ni mi gshegs pas ;üîΩ/ gnas ni thams cad dag tu yang //
analyzed: gang du yang ni mi gshegs pas ; / gnas ni thams cad dag tu yang //
translated: Nor will you go anywhere.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags //
translated: Therefore, the wise do not observeüîΩYou in any of the abodes.

original: gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas //
analyzed: gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas //
translated: If you are not like that,

original: bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang // bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba //
analyzed: bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang // bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba //
translated: You are accomplished through thought, and through accomplishment you are liberated.

original: de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags //
analyzed: de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags //
translated: This is your great wonder.

original: khyod nyid mthong na 'ching 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: khyod nyid mthong na 'ching 'gyur zhing //
translated: You are bound by seeing yourself,

original: ma mthong na yang 'ching bar 'gyur //üîΩkhyod nyid mthong na grol 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: ma mthong na yang 'ching bar 'gyur // khyod nyid mthong na grol 'gyur zhing //
translated: and you are bound by not seeing.üîΩYou are liberated by seeing yourself,

original: ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur //
translated: and you are liberated by not seeing.

original: ae ma ya mtshan cher 'ong ma //
analyzed: ae ma ya mtshan cher 'ong ma //
translated: How amazing!

original: grags ldan ma khyod bzang mo lags //
analyzed: grags ldan ma khyod bzang mo lags //
translated: You are a virtuous and famous woman.

original: shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin //
analyzed: shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin //
translated: You are very difficult to understand, like an illusion,

original: snang zhing mi snang ba yang lags //
analyzed: snang zhing mi snang ba yang lags //
translated: appearing and not appearing.üîΩYou are not relied upon by buddhas, pratyekabuddhas,

original: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos rnams kyis nges bsten ma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos rnams kyis nges bsten ma //
translated: or ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: khyod nyid gcig pu thar pa'i lam //
analyzed: khyod nyid gcig pu thar pa'i lam //
translated: You alone are the path of liberation.

original: de ltar gzhan dag med par nges //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan dag med par nges //
translated: Thus, it is certain that others do not exist.

original: lus can rnams la phan don du //üîΩtha snyad mdun du mdzad nas ni //
analyzed: lus can rnams la phan don du // tha snyad mdun du mdzad nas ni //
translated: For the benefit of embodied beings,

original: brtse bas 'jig rten mgon rnams kyis //
analyzed: brtse bas 'jig rten mgon rnams kyis //
translated: the lords of the world, out of love,üîΩhaving made conventions in front,

original: khyod bstan ma bstan par yang gda' //
analyzed: khyod bstan ma bstan par yang gda' //
translated: teach you, whether you are seen or not.

original: 'dir khyod bstod par sus rngo thogs //
analyzed: 'dir khyod bstod par sus rngo thogs //
translated: Who could praise you here?

original: mtshan ma med cing gos pa med //
analyzed: mtshan ma med cing gos pa med //
translated: You are without signs and without stain,

original: ngag gi yul kun las 'das ma //
analyzed: ngag gi yul kun las 'das ma //
translated: Beyond all objects of speech.

original: gang khyod 'gar yang rten mi mnga' //
analyzed: gang khyod 'gar yang rten mi mnga' //
translated: You are not supported anywhere.

original: de ltar gda' yang kun rdzob tu //
analyzed: de ltar gda' yang kun rdzob tu //
translated: And yet, in the relative,

original: bdag cag ngag lam 'di 'dra bas //
analyzed: bdag cag ngag lam 'di 'dra bas //
translated: We have taken this path of speech.

original: khyod ni bstod byar mi gda' na'ang //
analyzed: khyod ni bstod byar mi gda' na'ang //
translated: Although you are not to be praised,

original: bstod pas shin tu mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: bstod pas shin tu mya ngan 'das //
translated: We praise you, and so attain nirvana.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin bstod las //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin bstod las //
translated: In Praise of the Perfection of Wisdom

original: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
analyzed: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
translated: Whatever virtue I have gathered

original: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa //
analyzed: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa //
translated: By that, may the whole worldüîΩBe inclined to the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin gzhol shog / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin gzhol shog / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the Praise of the Perfection of Wisdom by Master ƒÄrya NƒÅgƒÅrjuna.
